content: this pattern is not for sale/resale you may sell only the finished product but you must credit the gussied up goose for the design this pattern was designed for a standard sized porch goose 23 inches tall this pattern includes the helmet the tennessee vols top and optional sleeves with wings there is also an example grid for reference on how to create the power t this pattern has not been tested yet please send any issues directly to me what you will need yarn medium weight yarn in orange and white hooks 5 5 mm i scissors for cutting the yarn needle for sewing and weaving in ends stitches you should know sts stitches slip knot chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet twice into one stitch decrease single_crochet 2 together half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hdc2tog half_double_crochet 2 together double_crochet double_crochet fphdc front post double_crochet magic_ring or any alternative to create a circle
